Interface ICoffeeDao

  • All Superinterfaces:

    CoffeeDao

    public interface ICoffeeDao
extends IGenericDao<Coffee,java.lang.Long>
    Interface for implementation by CoffeeDao class for specific operations with Coffee-entity
